text: The Straight Road is a 1914 American silent drama movie directed by Allan Dwan and starring Gladys Hanson, William Russell, Iva Shepard, Lorraine Huling, Arthur Hoops. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1914 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Allan Dwan
title: The Straight Road
